modName: Feed on dead animals as werewolf early savage feeding perk Dawnguard
summary:
Dawnguard required!
Ability to choose the Savage Feeding perk for the first perkpoint you get, allows you as a werewolf to feed on most dead creatures and animals. No other changes to the game. descriptionHtml:
Dawnguard required!
Ability to choose the Savage Feeding perk for the first perkpoint you get, allows you as a werewolf to feed on most dead creatures and animals. No other changes to the game. Original is The Perk avalible late in the Werewolf perktree, I just made the ability to choose this perk from first avalible perkpoint. For players who do not like canibalism.
author: KennyBall

files.name: Feed On Dead Animals as Werewolf Dawnguard
